strings.SS2_NEMBANDIT_OUTRO_FLAVOR: ..and so he left, with absolutely no regrets.
strings.SS2_NEMBANDIT_OUTRO_FAILURE: ..and so he returned, luck finally running out.
strings.SS2_NEMBANDIT_PASSIVE_DESC: Attack Speed decreases Utility cooldowns. Turning Invisible reloads your gun.
strings.SS2_NEMBANDIT_PRIMARY_DESC: Fire shot. Can hold up to 6 bullets. Reloading doesn't scale with attack speed.
strings.SS2_NEMBANDIT_SECONDARY_DESC: Are you ready to learn how to do a fucking infinite.
strings.SS2_NEMBANDIT_SPECIAL_DESC: Blow your load into some fuckass enemy. Uses all the bullets in your primary.
